amendment.description: To require a report on access by State and local law enforcement agencies to the Tipoff database on potential terrorists.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1362 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1362 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S9831-9832; text: CR S9831) To require a report on access by State and local law enforcement agencies to the Tipoff database on potential terrorists.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1362 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1362 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
